tool_description: "The PayPal for guns." Safe, easy payments for guns, ammo, and more. Learn more at https://www.guntab.com
title: GunTab

api_list.name: Read webhook
api_list.description: Retrieve details of an existing webhook.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://guntab.p.rapidapi.com/webhooks/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "guntab.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create webhook
api_list.description: Create a webhook that will fire for specific transaction events for the account.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://guntab.p.rapidapi.com/webhooks"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "guntab.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Read invoice
api_list.description: Retrieve an invoice to see the details.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://guntab.p.rapidapi.com/invoices/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "guntab.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create invoice
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to create an invoice. The response includes a URL you can redirect your buyer to, so they can click to pay.
api_list.code:

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "guntab.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
